name: Elle (contemporary)

era.label: Social media and digital-first fashion era

visual_treatment.color_palette: Saturated, Instagram-optimized colors with bold pops; millennial pink, electric blues, and high-contrast combinations; heavy use of neon accents
visual_treatment.lighting: Clean, bright lighting with minimal shadows; ring light effects; golden hour warmth mixed with studio perfection
visual_treatment.contrast: Medium-high contrast with blown-out highlights; punchy but not harsh; optimized for phone screens
visual_treatment.texture: Ultra-smooth skin retouching; crisp digital sharpness; glossy, plastic-like finish on surfaces

composition.framing: Tight crops focusing on faces and details; vertical compositions for mobile; dynamic off-center positioning
composition.spatial_relationships: Layered graphics over photography; text integration within images; collage-like assemblages
composition.perspectives: Slightly elevated angles; Dutch tilts for energy; close-up beauty shots mixed with full environmental context
composition.layout_philosophy: Organized chaos; maximalist but structured; designed for quick consumption and shareability

technical.film_or_technology: High-resolution digital cameras (Canon 5D, Phase One); iPhone photography integration; drone aerials
technical.lens_character: Sharp, clinical lenses; 85mm portraits; wide-angle environmental shots; minimal lens character
technical.post_processing: Heavy digital retouching; color grading for social media; selective saturation boosts; skin smoothing

cultural_context.values: Accessibility, diversity, body positivity, sustainability consciousness, digital-native lifestyle
cultural_context.subject_matter: Inclusive casting, street style, affordable fashion mixed with luxury, wellness culture, tech integration
cultural_context.target_audience: Millennial and Gen-Z women; digitally savvy; values-conscious consumers; global perspective
cultural_context.era_signature: Social media integration, influencer culture, fast fashion awareness, political engagement

temporal_markers: Augmented reality and digital filter influences
COVID-era mask fashion and home photography
distinguishing_features: Hybrid approach mixing professional photography with user-generated content aesthetics; heavy social media optimization; diverse representation as default rather than exception; technology-forward presentation methods
